short_summary: Request for Qualifications for a National Unexploded Explosive Ordnance (UXO) Source List at various locations across Canada
description: Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is calling for abbreviated proposals from UXO contractors to establish a National UXO Source List to provide “as and when required” services specific to Department of National Defence (DND) requirements for the locations mentioned above. The services are expected to be valued between $100,000 and $500,000.
full_summary:
# Unexploded Explosive Ordnances (UXO) Services Source List
## Request for Qualifications

### Tender Details

* Tender Reference Number: MX-22758596714
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: MECSL23
* Publication Date: 2023-05-16
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-26T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-06-26
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expired

### Notice of Tender

The Defence Construction Canada has issued a Request for Qualifications (RFQ) to establish a National Unexploded Explosive Ordnances (UXO) Source List. This RFQ is to provide "as and when required" services to meet the Department of National Defence (DND) requirements at various locations across Canada.

The source list will be established for a period of one (1) year with a maximum estimated value of $15,000,000.00. Commissions under the SL are expected to be valued between $100,000.00 and $500,000.00.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on established criteria in the RFQ document.

### Submissions

Firms interested in providing UXO services are invited to submit abbreviated proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the system.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Anne McCuaig
* Email: [Anne.Mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Anne.Mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-794-5281
* Notice URL: https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2494392754/abstract?language=EN
* Notice URL (French): https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2494392754/abstract?language=FR

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the MERX website. Fees may apply. Please refer to the MERX website for more information on pricing. http://www.merx.com public/pricing. Please note that the tender documents are only
